Back 2 The Block

SELF LOVE IS A MEDICINE

  • 8 Mar 2024
  • By Sandbox
  • 3 Comments
  • 3 Likes

This past weekend, Atlanta Utility Works played host to a spectacular event - My Black Is Beautiful Sunday Showcase. There was an amazing performance by the dynamic Peace L🦋VE Gang (PLG). The event was nothing short of magical, bringing together the community in celebration of beauty, culture, and empowerment.

Nestled in the heart of Atlanta, the industrial-chic backdrop of Atlanta Utility Works provided the perfect canvas for a day filled with creativity, style, and inspiration. The vibrant atmosphere set the stage for a memorable experienc

A beacon of community strength and pride, My Black Is Beautiful Sunday took center stage, showcasing a curated selection of products from local Black-owned businesses. Attendees immersed themselves in a shopping experience that not only celebrated individuality but also supported the growth of the community.

Sed posuere consectetur est at lobortis. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis mollis, est non commodo luctus, nisi erat porttitor ligula lacinia odio sem nec elit purus.

Very important person

One of the act performing during this transformative event were the charismatic Peace L🦋VE Gang - Leader of The Real and Master Shaolin. The PLG, abbreviated for Peace L🦋VE Gang, embodies unity, positivity, and empowerment. Through their leadership, they brought an energy that resonated with every participant, leaving a lasting impact on the hearts of all present.

To capture the essence of My Black Is Beautiful Sunday and the Peace L🦋VE Gang, we invite you to relive the magic through our exclusive event video. Press play, and immerse yourself in the vibrant moments, empowering messages, and the sheer joy that filled the air.

As the echoes of My Black Is Beautiful Sunday linger, let's continue the celebration of beauty, culture, and community. Share this blog, spread the love, and join the movement with the Peace L🦋VE Gang.

Thank you to Atlanta Utility Works, My Black Is Beautiful Sunday, and the Peace L🦋VE Gang for an unforgettable experience. Until the next celebration of unity and empowerment!
